entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 24.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 36 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023
